DOC.brief_summary: Determine the effect of WelChol tablets on serum lipids, lipoproteins, apolipoproteins, and lipoprotein particle size in patients who were stabilized on pravastatin therapy for at least 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Effect of WelChol Tablets on Cholesterol in Patients Who Have Been Taking Pravastatin for at Least 4 Weeks.
DOC.criteria: Male or female > or = to 18 years of age On a stable dose of pravastatin LDLC > or = to 100 mg/dL and < or = 250 mg/dL Triglycerides < or = to 300 mg/dL Women are not pregnant or breastfeeding or planning to become pregnant Women have had a hysterectomy or tubal ligation, or who are postmenopausal or who practice an accepted method of birth control as specified in the protocol BMI > 40 kg/m2 History of allergic or toxic reaction to colesevelam HCL History of swallowing disorder Any serious condition that would interfere with the conduct of the study
